name: Tribalism
governmentUniques: All cities will be captured when the capital got captured. Recieve 3 Spearman every time when a city is settled.

name: Monarchism
governmentUniques: When a Palace is built in a city, recieve +2 Cultural Point. When Great Person is expended, recieve +5 Cultural Point.

name: Tribal Chiefdom
governmentUniques: When at war, recieve +25% Production towards Melee and Scout units. When the capital is captured, can't settle new cities and can't recieve or built Settlers.

name: Parliamentary Monarchism
governmentUniques: Recieve the Friend status with every Cultural city-states, and recieve a Ranged unit when at war.

name: Classical Republicanism
governmentUniques: Recieve Great People 50 times faster. When a Great People is expended, recieve +5% in Culture, Faith, Gold, and Production.

name: Autocracy
governmentUniques: Receive one additional policy when adopts Under One Man. Recieve +5 Food every time a city have 2 farms.

name: Classical Oligarchy
governmentUniques: Recieve +2 Production in every Farm, every Pasture, every Barracks when adopts Under Multiple Men.

name: Theocracy
governmentUniques: When adopt this government, a Great Prophet will be built. When a Religious Building was built, recieve a Missionary. Great Prophet and Missionary can spread the religion 10 times.

name: Imamate
governmentUniques: Every Great Prophet is receiving the Allamah promotion and the missionary is recieving the Alim promotion. Every Mosque and Masjid that is built will recieve +10 Faith.

name: Emirate
governmentUniques: When Great General is built, the land units will got +5% attack effectiveness. When a Great Admiral is built, all Water units will have +5% attack effectiveness. When a Great General or a Great Admiral is expended, recieve 20-turn Golden Age.

name: Caliphate
governmentUniques: A Great People can be expended 2 times, except the Great Writer, Great Scientist can be expended 5 times, and Great Prophet can be expended 10 times. Recieve the Masjid wherever a city is adapting your religion.

name: Sultanate
governmentUniques: Recieve a Vizier for each of a city. Each Vizier can do something unique effects on a city based on you assigned them for.

name: Feudalism
governmentUniques: Civilian units must be protected by other units, or they can be captured by the Barbarian or enemy units. When the civilization is unhappy, the workers can make a Peasant Revolution. When the civilization is low on Melee, Ranged, Calvary, or Artillery units, the workers can turn into Peasant Levy.
